name: HollywoodRampage
description:
In this game you can play with a keyboard, a mouse or a gamepad as you prefer. Also you can jump in and out in anytime you want it. 
Beware you only got 4 continues to beat the final boss.
Are  you capable of that!?

Controls:

  • Keyboard
    • WASD: Move
    • Also W: Pick/drop object
    • J: Punch/Talk/Open door
    • K: Kick
    • L: Fend
    • Space: Jump
    • Esc: Pause
  • Mouse(You don't ant to do it)
    • Move: Move
    • Move up: Pick/drop object
    • Scroll up: Punch/Talk/Open door
    • Scroll down: Kick
    • Right button: Fend
    • Right button: Jump
    • Wheel: Pause
  • Gamepad()
    • Left Joystick: Move
    • Jowstick Up: Pick object
    • B/Circle : Punch/Talk/Open door
    • X/Square: Kick
    • Y/Triangle: Fend
    • A/Cross: Jump
